articleQueryAllSQL: select * from article limit <%= start %>, <%= end %>
articleQueryAllCountSQL: select count(*) as count from article
articleQueryByUserIdSQL: select * from article where user_id = '<%= user_id %>' limit <%= start %>, <%= end %>
articleQueryByUserIdCountSQL: select count(*) as count from article where user_id = '<%= user_id %>'
articleDetailSQL: select * from article where id='<%= id %>'
articlePublishSQL: insert into article (user_id, title, description, md_content, html_code) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= title %>','<%= description %>','<%= md_content %>','<%= html_code %>')
articleUpdateByIdSQL: update article set title='<%= title %>', description='<%= description %>', md_content='<%= md_content %>', html_code='<%= html_code %>' where id='<%= id %>'
articleDeleteSQL: delete from article where id='<%= id %>'
